media:group.media:title: Video Games About 9/11
media:group.media:description:
A critical look at 9/11-inspired video games and the ethics surrounding them.

Any money made from this video will go to the FDNY Foundation, the official charity group for the Fire Department of New York City. 

https://www.fdnyfoundation.org/ 

----REFERENCES------

GAMES
Grandfather Killed: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/31260
Samagotchi: http://www.dailygames.com/games/osamagotchi.html
The Only Solution: https://www.newgrounds.com/reviews/portal/31261/2/date/1
Trade Center Defender*: https://www.albinoblacksheep.com/games/nydefender
Bad Dudes vs. Bin Laden: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/31539
9/11 Simulator: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/547977
9/11 Jumper: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/579280
Turbin Hunt https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/31418

*The original Trade Center Defender has never been reuploaded, however, in 2003 an unnamed French programmer uploaded an identical recreation of the game. Footage was used from the recreation. 

BOOKS
The Expressive Power of Videogames: https://mitpress.mit.edu/books/persuasive-games
Philosophy Through Video Games: https://www.amazon.com/gp/offer-listing/0415988586
 
ARTICLES
The Life Story of Dorothy Gibson:
https://www.thehistorypress.co.uk/articles/dorothy-gibson-the-woman-who-survived-the-sinking-of-the-titanic-and-a-nazi-prison/
